Name: Master of the Forbidden Sea
About the game: Using the legendary Compass of Destiny an artifact with the power to detect sunken treasure, the daring captain and crew of the S.S. Midnight seek to change the fortune of a cursed colony located in a chaotic region of the Pacific... known as the Triangle of Doom . Confront the Unknown in a High Seas Adventure The Forbidden Sea covers a vast area which requires nearly one year of in game time to explore. As you learn to navigate its many islands, you will encounter stranger and more dangerous monsters. Beware, your enemies will grow in strength and numbers as you do. Dive to the Bottom X marks the spot. Then your crew will be diving in deep. Use a deadly harpoon gun or clever swimming to save your life and unlock chests. Sea animals cannot be killed in this game, but they can be defeated. Core Features 24 Lost Treasure Chests Strange Sea Monsters Procedural Diving System Purchase & Manage Resources Build skill as your Captain levels up Mysterious Undersea Realm Amazing Soundtrack Cloud Saves Pixel Blood & Gore FX [optional] Lovely Bar Wench to Dance with! Follow, Wishlist, & Buy Now! /
